Reviews.Title: help
Reviews.Author: darrin lundy
Reviews.Content: Will all of this phones features work on metro pcs - t mobile ..I hear some features from international version phones don't work in the USA

Reviews.Title: Samsung Regional SIM Lock is terrible.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this cellphone on Amazon, and I was really excited with it... until it arrived, and I realized that it had the Regional SIM Lock imposed by Samsung still on.  Now this phone won't accept any of my SIM cards and it's useless.Factory Unlocked? Will not buy from Samsung again, with this stupid regional sim lock thing.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It is everything I expected. Just didn't like all the Islam agenda that was pre loaded.
